title: Practical Application of Employee Competency and Maturity Assessment Framework

context.prior_knowledge: Core job-related competencies and at least three years of work experience within an organization
context.additional_context: Acquisition of competency assessment and development methodologies specialized in the language domain (job-related communication)

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their individual knowledge/skill levels using a five-stage maturity framework by comparing with organizational expert competency models
Learners can develop personalized learning plans (academic/practical integration) based on competency gap analysis
Learners can design competency benchmarking and feedback processes with peers using LMS collaboration tools
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
